desc: The subscription box for kids who love great stories, yet struggle with reading. A monthly interactive experience in a box where your family will journey through a story where books come to life through minimal reading games and adventures, helpful products and simple solutions - delivering fun, hope and confidence.

layout.text: For Kids Who Love Great Stories, Yet Struggle With Reading
Dyslexia Together Box is the subscription box for kids, that builds confidence and hope one great book adventure at a time.
